name: Carbonweave silk corporate shirt
overview: A formal shirt that is part of the Corporate set. It has no special stats, other than its unique appearance.

quote.text: All the money ain't worth frack. You play this game for power. The power to get things done; to make the big decisions; to affect things. You make a phone call, and the next thing you know, you're telling the president of some bushleague Euronation that he'd better play it your way, or he's history.
quote.author: An Unidentified Corporate
